title: The White Necromancer - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Divine Protection   Fantasy World   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in a Game World   Romantic Subplot   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Hidefumi   秀文
description:
I died of sickness at age 15 and reincarnated into my favorite MMORPG, War Chronicles of Desgarde.

I learn that I have the Necromancer ability, the class I played in my previous life.

I decided to make full use of my game knowledge. Finance using production knowledge. Get high-level equipment. The location of the necessary materials was all in my head. But when people in power start to take notice of me… This story is about me overcoming trials, forming an army of ghosts, and my journey to becoming the Necromancer King.>
